trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that creates an animation that resembles a spring oscillating back and forth until it comes to rest.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma função de atenuação que cria uma animação que se parece com um spring oscilatórios e para trás até que se trata de rest.

trans-unit.source: You can control when in the "spring" behavior occurs in an animation by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode controlar quando na primavera"" ocorre em uma animação, especificando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrates the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: O gráfico a seguir demonstra os diferentes valores de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, onde *f*(*t*) representa o progresso de animação e *t* representa a hora.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: ![ElasticEase com gráficos de diferentes easingmodes. ] (~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase com gráficos de diferentes easingmodes.")

trans-unit.source: You can specify how many times the animation oscillates back and forth using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations%2A> property and how tight the springiness of the oscillations are using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar quantas vezes a animação oscila alternadas usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations%2A>propriedade e como justa springiness da oscilações estiver usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because this animation causes values to oscillate back and forth, the animation might interpolate into negative numbers unexpectedly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Porque esta animação faz com que valores oscilar e para trás, a animação pode interpolar inesperadamente em números negativos.

trans-unit.source: This can cause errors when animating properties that do not allow negative numbers.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode causar erros quando a animação de propriedades que não aceitam números negativos.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you apply this animation to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of an object (e.g. from 0 to 200 with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>), the animation will attempt to interpolate through negative numbers for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> which will throw an error.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você aplicar essa animação para o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>de um objeto (por exemplo, de 0 a 200 com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>), a animação tentará interpolar por meio de números negativos para <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>que gerará um erro.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are several other easing functions besides ElasticEase which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: Há várias outras funções de atenuação além ElasticEase que você pode explorar usando o exemplo a seguir do Silverlight.

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: [Executar este exemplo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) além de usar as funções de atenuação incluídas no tempo de execução, você pode criar suas próprias funções personalizadas de atenuação herdando de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do elemento de objeto de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: Ao criar uma classe derivada, você deve substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: Classes de animação herdam indiretamente <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, você precisa substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>método para construir um objeto de animação personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância.

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a parte da lógica da função de atenuação que você pode substituir para produzir o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"> </xref> modo da função de atenuação personalizada.

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método transforma tempo normalizado para controlar o andamento de uma animação para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>caso de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> cases.
trans-unit.target: Você só precisa especificar a função de easing para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>caso porque a implementação do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>método transformações `normalizedTime` para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>casos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: Tempo normalizado (progresso) da animação.

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: Um duplo que representa o progresso transformado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of times the target slides back and forth over the animation destination.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de vezes que os slides de destino e para trás sobre o destino de animação.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ```

trans-unit.source: The number of times the target slides back and forth over the animation destination.
trans-unit.target: O número de vezes que o destino e para trás slides sobre o destino de animação.

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor deve ser maior ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 3.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the stiffness of the spring.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a rigidez da primavera.

trans-unit.source: The smaller the Springiness value is, the stiffer the spring and the faster the elasticity decreases in intensity over each oscillation.
trans-unit.target: Quanto menor o valor de Springiness for, a suspensão das e mais rápido a elasticidade diminui de intensidade cada oscilação.

trans-unit.source: The smaller the Springiness value is, the stiffer the spring and the faster the elasticity decreases in intensity over each oscillation.
trans-unit.target: Quanto menor o valor de Springiness for, a suspensão das e mais rápido a elasticidade diminui de intensidade cada oscilação.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.SpringinessProperty> The following diagram illustrates the effect of different values of Springiness.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.SpringinessProperty>o diagrama a seguir ilustra o efeito de valores diferentes de Springiness.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.SpringinessProperty>

trans-unit.source: ![Demonstrates different Springiness values.](~/add/media/elasticease-springiness.png "Demonstrates different Springiness values.")
trans-unit.target: ![Demonstra diferentes valores de Springiness. ] (~/add/media/elasticease-springiness.png "Demonstra diferentes valores de Springiness.")

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: A positive number that specifies the stiffness of the spring.
trans-unit.target: Um número positivo que especifica a rigidez da primavera.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 3.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 3.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
